NuPylot

Making robot intelligence affordable for all

Our embodied intelligence solutions provide a full range of services—from hardware design to software development, and from data analysis to continuous optimization—adaptable to industries and application needs. We are committed to offering research institutions, enterprises, and developers flexible, reliable, and efficient solutions

DORA Robot Middleware

Provides high performance middleware designed specifically for robotics applications. It offers modular, low-latency communication mechanisms for robot systems, helping developers more efficiently perform multi-sensor data fusion and distributed computing.

Industrial System Integration & Optimization

Provides integration of robotic systems into clients' existing IT architecture and operating systems, including ERP, WMS, MES, etc. Ensures seamless collaboration between robots and other systems, enabling real-time information sharing and business process automation.

Agricultural Automation

Provides robotic technology applications for small-scale automation tasks in agriculture, such as harvesting and weeding. Low-cost, high-performance robots for small-scale agricultural automation. Robots are designed to be used in a wide range of agricultural scenarios.

Data Collection & Analysis

Provides data analysis and visualization tools to help monitor production conditions in real-time, optimize strategies and resource usage, improve yield and quality.

Remote Monitoring & Control

Provides cloud platform for remote monitoring of robot operation status, viewing real-time operation data, and adjusting robot tasks as needed.

Customized Solutions

We provide specially designed robots and solutions for different application scenarios to meet the specific needs of various industries.

Full-Stack AI for Robotics

  • DORA Robot Middleware: A middleware platform designed for robot developers to simplify and accelerate the development, testing and deployment of robot applications. It provides a set of universal tools and interfaces, supporting integration of various robot hardware platforms and software environments, promoting interoperability between different systems.
  • Algorithm & Model Library: Provides pre-trained deep learning model library, including models for visual recognition, path planning, motion control, natural language processing and other fields, helping developers quickly build and deploy robot applications. Meanwhile, we support customized model training and optimization to meet application needs in specific scenarios.
  • Operating Systems: Supports OpenHarmony, Ubuntu, Arceos

Based on developer-familiar YAML for Agent data flow orchestration, developers don't need to worry about specific computation processes, DORA provides adaptation capabilities for different software and hardware capabilities.

Check Code!

Consulting Services

  • Smart Manufacturing: Robot assembly, quality inspection and material handling tasks based on large models, using data-driven optimization strategies to improve production line automation level and capacity.
  • Logistics & Warehousing: Intelligent storage, sorting and transportation solutions for warehouses and distribution centers using large model-based robots, improving inventory management and order processing efficiency, supporting large-scale logistics operations.
  • Agricultural Robots: Planting, harvesting, fertilizing and weeding tasks completed by robots based on large model algorithms, reducing manual labor and improving agricultural production precision and efficiency through intelligent perception and decision-making.
  • Service Robots: Service robots powered by large models perform reception, guidance, cleaning and delivery tasks in hotels, shopping malls, exhibition halls and other venues, enhancing customer experience and achieving personalized and efficient service.
